oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Treatise on the canon of medicine.
li-Abū ʻAlī al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs Ibn Sīnā. Maʻa baʻḍ taʼlīfih wa-huwa ʻilm al-manṭiq wa-ʻilm al-ṭabīʻī wa-ʻilm al-kalām.
Also contains Avicenna's philosophical work the Kitāb al-Najāh.
